insert into mro_spare_parts (create_by, create_time, modified_by, modified_time, name, railways_bureau_id, signal_depot_id, special_railway_line_id,station_id, execution_mode, execution_time,cycle_type, cycle_value, cycle_description,is_start, context) values
(#{sparePartsEntity.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparePartsEntity.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sparePartsEntity.modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparePartsEntity.modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sparePartsEntity.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparePartsEntity.railwaysBureauId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sparePartsEntity.signalDepotId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sparePartsEntity.specialRailwayLineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sparePartsEntity.stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sparePartsEntity.executionMode,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sparePartsEntity.executionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sparePartsEntity.cycleType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sparePartsEntity.cycleValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparePartsEntity.cycleDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sparePartsEntity.isStart,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sparePartsEntity.context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.sql: mp.id as mp_id, create_by, create_time, modified_by, modified_time, name, railways_bureau_id,signal_depot_id, special_railway_line_id, station_id, execution_mode, execution_time,cycle_type, cycle_value, cycle_description, is_start,context, t.tid as t_id,tlj_name, d.did as d_id,dwd_name, x.xid as x_id,xd_name, c.cid as c_id,cz_name

mro_spare_parts mp inner join mro_tieluju t on mp.railways_bureau_id=t.tid inner join mro_dianwuduan d on mp.signal_depot_id=d.did inner join mro_xianduan x on mp.special_railway_line_id=x.xid inner join mro_chezhan c on mp.station_id=c.cid
